TermDefinition.DefinitionText: Cells of a single type (human, animal, or plant) that have been adapted to grow continuously in the laboratory and are used in research.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "cultured cell line"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "línea celular de cultivo"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Células de un tipo único (humano, animal o vegetal) que se han adaptado para crecer continuamente en el laboratorio y que se usan en investigación.
